name: Bubble Connect: Blast!
description:
fascinating bubbles match game
Connect 3 or more bubbles of the same color to easily eliminate them!
The more bubbles connected, the higher the score and reward!
Complete each level and get special rewards!
Try to connect more bubbles and feel the wonderful effect!
The rules are simple, but full of fun!
Easy, fun and fascinating!
Play the game offline, you can enjoy the fun of the game anytime, anywhere!
